## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyse traffic. By clicking ‘Allow all’, you consent to storing cookies on your device as described in our cookie policy. You can also choose ‘Deny all’ or ‘Allow custom selection’. Please note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality and your browsing experience. However, you can change your cookie settings at any time. You can find more information on our [privacy and cookie page](https://www.autolus.com/privacy-cookies/ "Privacy and cookies information").

Consent Selection

**Necessary**

**Preferences**

**Statistics**

**Marketing**

[Show details](#)

  * Necessary  24

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

    * [Cloudflare10](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/ "Cloudflare's privacy policy")

**__cflb** This cookie is set by Cloudflare for Load Balancer session affinity.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**__cfruid** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to enforce security rate limits on the website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_cfuvid** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to enforce security rate limits on the website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CF_Authorization** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. When you protect a site with Cloudflare Access, Cloudflare checks every HTTP request bound for that site to ensure that the request has a valid CF_Authorization cookie.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_*** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to check whether Cloudflare Edge server supports cookies. It can be deleted if seen.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_3** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to check whether the Cloudflare Edge server supports cookies. It can be deleted if seen.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_i** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_m** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_ni** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_clearance** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to store the proof of challenge passed. It is used to no longer issue a challenge if present. It is required to reach an origin server.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Google5](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**_ga_YJDYXQF2YS** This cookie is set by Google Tag Manager and it is required for the cookie management.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_GRECAPTCHA** This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 8 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CONSENT** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to store a user’s state regarding their cookies choices.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 13 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**DV** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to measure the visitors’ actions for the ReCaptcha, and it saves users' preferences to improve the experience across Google services.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**SOCS** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to store a user’s state regarding their cookies choices.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft2](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**ARRAffinity** This cookie is set by the Windows Azure cloud platform. It is used for load balancing to make sure the visitor page requests are routed to the same server in any browsing session.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**ARRAffinitySameSite** This cookie is set by the Windows Azure cloud platform. It is used for load balancing to make sure the visitor page requests are routed to the same server in any browsing session.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [akamai.com1](#)

**bm_sv** This cookie is necessary for the Akamai cache function. A cache is used by the website to optimize the response time between the visitor and the website. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [autolus.comcloudflare.comfonts.net3](#)

**__cf_bm [x3]** This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [www.autolus.com3](#)

**.AspNetCore.Antiforgery** This cookie is used by websites made with ASP.NET MVC to prevent unauthorized content posting, a security issue known as Cross-Site Request Forgery. It doesn't store user information and gets deleted when you close your browser.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**ASP.NET_SessionId** ASP.Net_SessionId is a cookie which is used to identify the users session on the server. The session being an area on the server which can be used to store session state in between http requests.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CookieConsent** Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Preferences  1

Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

    * [Vimeo1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://vimeo.com/privacy "Vimeo's privacy policy")

**player** This cookie is set by Vimeo to save your settings before you play an embedded Vimeo video. This means that the next time you watch a Vimeo video, you will get your preferred settings back.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Statistics  11

Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

    * [Adobe Inc.4](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://www.adobe.com/privacy.html "Adobe Inc.'s privacy policy")

**AMCV_98CF678254E93B1 B0A4C98A5%40AdobeOrg** This cookie is used Adobe Analytics to identify a unique visitor. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**AMCVS_98CF678254E93B1 B0A4C98A5%40AdobeOrg** This cookie is set by Adobe Experience Cloud and it is used track visitors across your different Adobe domains.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**s_cc** This cookie is used by Adobe Analytics. It is set and read by the JavaScript code to determine if cookies are enabled.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**s_sq** This cookie is used by Adobe Analytics. It is set and read by the JavaScript code when the ActivityMap functionality is enabled; it contains information about the previous link on this site that was clicked on by the user. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Google1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**_ga** This cookie is set by Google Analytics. It distinguishes unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier. It is included in each page request in a site and used to calculate visitor, session and campaign data for the sites analytics reports.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft3](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**_clck** This cookie is set by Clarity to connect multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_clsk** This cookie is set by Clarity to connect multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CLID** This cookie is set by Clarity and identifies the first-time Clarity saw this user on any site using Clarity.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [New Relic1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://newrelic.com/termsandconditions/privacy "New Relic's privacy policy")

**JSESSIONID** This cookie is set by New Relic. It is used to provide a platform for monitoring the performance of web and mobile applications.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Vimeo1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://vimeo.com/privacy "Vimeo's privacy policy")

**vuid** This cookie is set by Vimeo and it is triggered when playing an embedded Vimeo video on a specific page. Vimeo uses it to enhance the video player experience.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [akamai.com1](#)

**ak_bmsc** This cookie is set by Akamai and it is used to optimize performance, and to improve the user experience, on Akamai websites.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Marketing  6

Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

    * [Google2](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**__Secure-1PSID** This cookie is set by Google. It is used for targeting purposes to build a profile of the website visitor's interests in order to show relevant & personalised Google advertising

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**__Secure-3PSIDCC** This cookie is set by Google. It is used for targeting purposes to build a profile of the website visitor's interests in order to show relevant & personalised Google advertising.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft4](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**ANONCHK** This cookie is set by Clarity and indicates whether MUID is transferred to ANID, a cookie used for advertising. Clarity doesn't use ANID and so this is always set to 0.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**MR** This cookie is set by Microsoft as a unique user identifier. It can be set by embedded Microsoft scripts. It is widely believed to sync across many different Microsoft domains, allowing user tracking.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 6 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**MUID** This cookie is set by Microsoft as a unique user identifier. It can be set by embedded Microsoft scripts. It is widely believed to sync across many different Microsoft domains, allowing user tracking.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**SM** This cookie is set by Clarity. It is used to synchronise the MUID across Microsoft domains.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Unclassified 0

Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies.

We do not use cookies of this type.

## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyse traffic. By clicking ‘Allow all’, you consent to storing cookies on your device as described in our cookie policy. You can also choose ‘Deny all’ or ‘Allow custom selection’. Please note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality and your browsing experience. However, you can change your cookie settings at any time. You can find more information on our [privacy and cookie page](https://www.autolus.com/privacy-cookies/ "Privacy and cookies information").

Consent Selection

**Necessary**

**Preferences**

**Statistics**

**Marketing**

[Show details](#)

  * Necessary  24

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

    * [Cloudflare10](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/ "Cloudflare's privacy policy")

**__cflb** This cookie is set by Cloudflare for Load Balancer session affinity.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**__cfruid** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to enforce security rate limits on the website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_cfuvid** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to enforce security rate limits on the website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CF_Authorization** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. When you protect a site with Cloudflare Access, Cloudflare checks every HTTP request bound for that site to ensure that the request has a valid CF_Authorization cookie.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_*** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to check whether Cloudflare Edge server supports cookies. It can be deleted if seen.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_3** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to check whether the Cloudflare Edge server supports cookies. It can be deleted if seen.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_i** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_m** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_ni** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_clearance** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to store the proof of challenge passed. It is used to no longer issue a challenge if present. It is required to reach an origin server.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Google5](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**_ga_YJDYXQF2YS** This cookie is set by Google Tag Manager and it is required for the cookie management.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_GRECAPTCHA** This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 8 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CONSENT** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to store a user’s state regarding their cookies choices.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 13 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**DV** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to measure the visitors’ actions for the ReCaptcha, and it saves users' preferences to improve the experience across Google services.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**SOCS** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to store a user’s state regarding their cookies choices.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft2](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**ARRAffinity** This cookie is set by the Windows Azure cloud platform. It is used for load balancing to make sure the visitor page requests are routed to the same server in any browsing session.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**ARRAffinitySameSite** This cookie is set by the Windows Azure cloud platform. It is used for load balancing to make sure the visitor page requests are routed to the same server in any browsing session.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [akamai.com1](#)

**bm_sv** This cookie is necessary for the Akamai cache function. A cache is used by the website to optimize the response time between the visitor and the website. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [autolus.comcloudflare.comfonts.net3](#)

**__cf_bm [x3]** This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [www.autolus.com3](#)

**.AspNetCore.Antiforgery** This cookie is used by websites made with ASP.NET MVC to prevent unauthorized content posting, a security issue known as Cross-Site Request Forgery. It doesn't store user information and gets deleted when you close your browser.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**ASP.NET_SessionId** ASP.Net_SessionId is a cookie which is used to identify the users session on the server. The session being an area on the server which can be used to store session state in between http requests.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CookieConsent** Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Preferences  1

Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

    * [Vimeo1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://vimeo.com/privacy "Vimeo's privacy policy")

**player** This cookie is set by Vimeo to save your settings before you play an embedded Vimeo video. This means that the next time you watch a Vimeo video, you will get your preferred settings back.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Statistics  11

Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

    * [Adobe Inc.4](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://www.adobe.com/privacy.html "Adobe Inc.'s privacy policy")

**AMCV_98CF678254E93B1 B0A4C98A5%40AdobeOrg** This cookie is used Adobe Analytics to identify a unique visitor. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**AMCVS_98CF678254E93B1 B0A4C98A5%40AdobeOrg** This cookie is set by Adobe Experience Cloud and it is used track visitors across your different Adobe domains.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**s_cc** This cookie is used by Adobe Analytics. It is set and read by the JavaScript code to determine if cookies are enabled.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**s_sq** This cookie is used by Adobe Analytics. It is set and read by the JavaScript code when the ActivityMap functionality is enabled; it contains information about the previous link on this site that was clicked on by the user. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Google1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**_ga** This cookie is set by Google Analytics. It distinguishes unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier. It is included in each page request in a site and used to calculate visitor, session and campaign data for the sites analytics reports.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft3](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**_clck** This cookie is set by Clarity to connect multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_clsk** This cookie is set by Clarity to connect multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CLID** This cookie is set by Clarity and identifies the first-time Clarity saw this user on any site using Clarity.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [New Relic1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://newrelic.com/termsandconditions/privacy "New Relic's privacy policy")

**JSESSIONID** This cookie is set by New Relic. It is used to provide a platform for monitoring the performance of web and mobile applications.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Vimeo1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://vimeo.com/privacy "Vimeo's privacy policy")

**vuid** This cookie is set by Vimeo and it is triggered when playing an embedded Vimeo video on a specific page. Vimeo uses it to enhance the video player experience.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [akamai.com1](#)

**ak_bmsc** This cookie is set by Akamai and it is used to optimize performance, and to improve the user experience, on Akamai websites.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Marketing  6

Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

    * [Google2](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**__Secure-1PSID** This cookie is set by Google. It is used for targeting purposes to build a profile of the website visitor's interests in order to show relevant & personalised Google advertising

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**__Secure-3PSIDCC** This cookie is set by Google. It is used for targeting purposes to build a profile of the website visitor's interests in order to show relevant & personalised Google advertising.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft4](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**ANONCHK** This cookie is set by Clarity and indicates whether MUID is transferred to ANID, a cookie used for advertising. Clarity doesn't use ANID and so this is always set to 0.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**MR** This cookie is set by Microsoft as a unique user identifier. It can be set by embedded Microsoft scripts. It is widely believed to sync across many different Microsoft domains, allowing user tracking.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 6 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**MUID** This cookie is set by Microsoft as a unique user identifier. It can be set by embedded Microsoft scripts. It is widely believed to sync across many different Microsoft domains, allowing user tracking.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**SM** This cookie is set by Clarity. It is used to synchronise the MUID across Microsoft domains.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Unclassified 0

Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies.

We do not use cookies of this type.

Important Safety Information
• The safety of AUCATZYL includes a boxed warning for CRS, neurologic toxicities, and secondary
hematological malignancies. ICANS, including fatal or life-threatening reactions, occurred in patients
receiving AUCATZYL. T-cell malignancies have occurred following treatment of hematologic malignancies
with BCMA- and CD19-directed genetically modified autologous T-cell immunotherapies.
• In the FELIX trial, severe, including life-threatening and fatal infections occurred in patients after AUCATZYL
infusion. The non-COVID-19 infections of all grades occurred in 67% (67/100) of patients. Grade 3 or
higher non-COVID-19 infections occurred in 41% (41/100) of patients.
• Please see full Prescribing Information, including BOXED WARNING and Medication Guide.

Developing Next Generation Programmed T Cell Therapies
Overview of FELIX 1b/2 clinical experience to date
FELIX pooled analysis of all cohorts presented ASH 2023 and ASCO/EHA 2024
Durable and robust response rates 1
• The ORR (CR/CRi) in all patients who received obe-cel in the FELIX study was 78%
• The 12-month EFS and OS rates were 49.5% and 61.1% respectively (median follow up of 21.5 months)
• 40% of responders in ongoing remission without subsequent SCT/other therapy (median follow-up of 21.5 months)
• Survival outcomes show potential of long-term plateau
Predictable and manageable tolerability
• Low rates of Grade ≥3 CRS (2%) and low rates of Grade ≥3 ICANS (7%)2
Durable remission rates and toxicity inversely correlated with leukemic burden 2
• Assessment of leukemic burden at lymphodepletion is essential for risk/benefit stratification
Timely and reliable product supply
• Obe-cel successfully manufactured for 95% of leukapheresed patients2
• Vein to certification time of ~21 days in pivotal study3; targeting ~16 days at launch

FELIX study - pooled analysis of all cohorts
• 40% of responders in ongoing remission without subsequent SCT/other therapy, with a median follow-up of 21.5 months

Developing Next Generation Programmed T Cell Therapies
ASH 2023 takeaway messages
• Obe-cel successfully manufactured in 95% of leukapheresed patients
• High remission rates independent of leukemic burden at lymphodepletion
• 50% EFS estimate at 12 months, with only 17% of responders proceeding to SCT while in remission
• Favorable safety profile: 2% grade ≥3 CRS and 7% grade ≥3 ICANS
• Severe toxicity mostly limited to patients with high leukemic burden at lymphodepletion
• Durable remission rates and toxicity inversely correlated with leukemic burden at lymphodepletion
• Assessment of leukemic burden at lymphodepletion is essential for risk/benefit stratification

## This website uses cookies

We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyse traffic. By clicking ‘Allow all’, you consent to storing cookies on your device as described in our cookie policy. You can also choose ‘Deny all’ or ‘Allow custom selection’. Please note that disabling cookies may affect website functionality and your browsing experience. However, you can change your cookie settings at any time. You can find more information on our [privacy and cookie page](https://www.autolus.com/privacy-cookies/ "Privacy and cookies information").

Consent Selection

**Necessary**

**Preferences**

**Statistics**

**Marketing**

[Show details](#)

  * Necessary  24

Necessary cookies help make a website usable by enabling basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.

    * [Cloudflare10](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/ "Cloudflare's privacy policy")

**__cflb** This cookie is set by Cloudflare for Load Balancer session affinity.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**__cfruid** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to enforce security rate limits on the website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_cfuvid** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to enforce security rate limits on the website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CF_Authorization** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. When you protect a site with Cloudflare Access, Cloudflare checks every HTTP request bound for that site to ensure that the request has a valid CF_Authorization cookie.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_*** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to check whether Cloudflare Edge server supports cookies. It can be deleted if seen.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_3** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to check whether the Cloudflare Edge server supports cookies. It can be deleted if seen.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_i** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_m** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_chl_rc_ni** This cookie is set by Cloudflare. It is used internally by Cloudflare to identify production issues on clients.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**cf_clearance** This cookie is set by Cloudflare to store the proof of challenge passed. It is used to no longer issue a challenge if present. It is required to reach an origin server.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Google5](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**_ga_YJDYXQF2YS** This cookie is set by Google Tag Manager and it is required for the cookie management.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_GRECAPTCHA** This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 8 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CONSENT** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to store a user’s state regarding their cookies choices.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 13 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**DV** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to measure the visitors’ actions for the ReCaptcha, and it saves users' preferences to improve the experience across Google services.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**SOCS** This cookie is set by Google. It is used to store a user’s state regarding their cookies choices.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft2](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**ARRAffinity** This cookie is set by the Windows Azure cloud platform. It is used for load balancing to make sure the visitor page requests are routed to the same server in any browsing session.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**ARRAffinitySameSite** This cookie is set by the Windows Azure cloud platform. It is used for load balancing to make sure the visitor page requests are routed to the same server in any browsing session.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [akamai.com1](#)

**bm_sv** This cookie is necessary for the Akamai cache function. A cache is used by the website to optimize the response time between the visitor and the website. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [autolus.comcloudflare.comfonts.net3](#)

**__cf_bm [x3]** This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [www.autolus.com3](#)

**.AspNetCore.Antiforgery** This cookie is used by websites made with ASP.NET MVC to prevent unauthorized content posting, a security issue known as Cross-Site Request Forgery. It doesn't store user information and gets deleted when you close your browser.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**ASP.NET_SessionId** ASP.Net_SessionId is a cookie which is used to identify the users session on the server. The session being an area on the server which can be used to store session state in between http requests.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CookieConsent** Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Preferences  1

Preference cookies enable a website to remember information that changes the way the website behaves or looks, like your preferred language or the region that you are in.

    * [Vimeo1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://vimeo.com/privacy "Vimeo's privacy policy")

**player** This cookie is set by Vimeo to save your settings before you play an embedded Vimeo video. This means that the next time you watch a Vimeo video, you will get your preferred settings back.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Statistics  11

Statistic cookies help website owners to understand how visitors interact with websites by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

    * [Adobe Inc.4](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://www.adobe.com/privacy.html "Adobe Inc.'s privacy policy")

**AMCV_98CF678254E93B1 B0A4C98A5%40AdobeOrg** This cookie is used Adobe Analytics to identify a unique visitor. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**AMCVS_98CF678254E93B1 B0A4C98A5%40AdobeOrg** This cookie is set by Adobe Experience Cloud and it is used track visitors across your different Adobe domains.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**s_cc** This cookie is used by Adobe Analytics. It is set and read by the JavaScript code to determine if cookies are enabled.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**s_sq** This cookie is used by Adobe Analytics. It is set and read by the JavaScript code when the ActivityMap functionality is enabled; it contains information about the previous link on this site that was clicked on by the user. 

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Google1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**_ga** This cookie is set by Google Analytics. It distinguishes unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier. It is included in each page request in a site and used to calculate visitor, session and campaign data for the sites analytics reports.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft3](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**_clck** This cookie is set by Clarity to connect multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**_clsk** This cookie is set by Clarity to connect multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 day**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**CLID** This cookie is set by Clarity and identifies the first-time Clarity saw this user on any site using Clarity.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [New Relic1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://newrelic.com/termsandconditions/privacy "New Relic's privacy policy")

**JSESSIONID** This cookie is set by New Relic. It is used to provide a platform for monitoring the performance of web and mobile applications.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Vimeo1](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://vimeo.com/privacy "Vimeo's privacy policy")

**vuid** This cookie is set by Vimeo and it is triggered when playing an embedded Vimeo video on a specific page. Vimeo uses it to enhance the video player experience.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [akamai.com1](#)

**ak_bmsc** This cookie is set by Akamai and it is used to optimize performance, and to improve the user experience, on Akamai websites.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Marketing  6

Marketing cookies are used to track visitors across websites. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user and thereby more valuable for publishers and third party advertisers.

    * [Google2](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://business.safety.google/privacy/ "Google's privacy policy")

Some of the data collected by this provider is for the purposes of personalization and measuring advertising effectiveness.

**__Secure-1PSID** This cookie is set by Google. It is used for targeting purposes to build a profile of the website visitor's interests in order to show relevant & personalised Google advertising

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**__Secure-3PSIDCC** This cookie is set by Google. It is used for targeting purposes to build a profile of the website visitor's interests in order to show relevant & personalised Google advertising.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 2 years**Type** : HTTP Cookie

    * [Microsoft4](#)[Learn more about this provider![]()](https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement "Microsoft's privacy policy")

**ANONCHK** This cookie is set by Clarity and indicates whether MUID is transferred to ANID, a cookie used for advertising. Clarity doesn't use ANID and so this is always set to 0.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**MR** This cookie is set by Microsoft as a unique user identifier. It can be set by embedded Microsoft scripts. It is widely believed to sync across many different Microsoft domains, allowing user tracking.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 6 months**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**MUID** This cookie is set by Microsoft as a unique user identifier. It can be set by embedded Microsoft scripts. It is widely believed to sync across many different Microsoft domains, allowing user tracking.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : 1 year**Type** : HTTP Cookie

**SM** This cookie is set by Clarity. It is used to synchronise the MUID across Microsoft domains.

**Maximum Storage Duration** : Session**Type** : HTTP Cookie

  * Unclassified 0

Unclassified cookies are cookies that we are in the process of classifying, together with the providers of individual cookies.

We do not use cookies of this type.

# Corporate governance

  1. [Home](/)
  2. [Investor relations](/investor-relations/)



Corporate governance

![](/media/uxmczggz/autolus_1240.jpg?rxy=0.49928263988522237,0.42181743052925175&width=780&height=780&v=1d7e091ec7417f0)

The Board of Directors of Autolus Therapeutics plc sets high standards for our employees, officers and directors. Implicit in this philosophy is the importance of sound corporate governance.

It is the duty of the Board of Directors to serve as a prudent fiduciary for shareholders and to oversee the management of our business. To fulfill its responsibilities and to discharge its duty, the Board of Directors follows the procedures and standards that are set forth in our Code of Business Conduct and Ethics and the charters of the standing committees of the Board of Directors.

The Code of Conduct and the charters are subject to modification from time to time as the Board of Directors deems appropriate in the best interests of the Company or as required by applicable laws and regulations.
